gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
kills a person, animal or plant
, povzroči, da neka oseba, žival ali rastlina umre.

seg.quote: He had tried to kill himself five times.
The sun had killed most of the plants.
Her mother was killed in a car crash.

sense.def:
The kill
je uboj živali, potem ko jo ulovimo.

seg.quote: The hunters move in for the kill.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
kills an activity, process, or feeling
, prepreči, da bi se tista dejavnost, proces ali čustvo nadaljevalo.

seg.quote: His behaviour outraged me and killed our friendship.
These latest measures killed all hope of any relaxation of the system.

sense.def:
To kill time
pomeni početi nekaj nepomembnega ali nezanimivega, medtem ko čakamo.

seg.quote: He spent long hours keeping out of the way, killing time.

xr.QF: kill two birds with one stone:

sense.def:
To kill something off
pomeni nekaj popolnoma uničiti.

seg.quote: This discovery killed off one of the last surviving romances about the place.
The bacteria had been killed off.
